vclaim: The man who claimed to find “shrimp tails” in a box of Cinnamon Toast Crunch is married to the actress who played Topanga in “Boy Meets World” and he purchased the cereal in question at a Costco located on Topanga Canyon Boulevard.
title: Is Shrimpgate Guy Married to Actor Who Played Topanga on ‘Boy Meets World’?
subtitle: What is going on?
author: Madison Dapcevich
